programmes.show_description: Unsettling horror. A family wakes up on Christmas morning to discover they are trapped indoors, and receive a series of increasingly disturbing instructions through their television set. (2018)
Western starring Luke Perry. A sheriff stops at nothing to find the escaped criminal who murdered the sheriff's wife and son. (2008)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
A timid clerk discovers he can accomplish all he wants with the power of his mind. S2, Ep27
Could broken ice in a New England pond reveal the landing spot of a UFO? S2, Ep28

Post-apocalyptic action with Dean Cain. When a meteor strike leaves the Earth covered in ice, a group of survivors set out across a desolate landscape to find a device that can save mankind. (2004)

Crime thriller starring Morgan Freeman. A thief in debt to the Russian mob persuades a rookie crook to help steal the last pair of original Faberge eggs. (2009)

Action thriller with Henry Cavill. A police officer and a vigilante are caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a troubled, recently-arrested man who is linked to years of female abductions. (2018)
